publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-300# Rosie Kane: Inhumanity at Dungavel—That the Parliament condemns the appalling practices of depriving children of food and fining parents at the Dungavel House immigration removal centre and considers that there should be a full public inquiry into the operation of Dungavel to assess its impact on the physical and mental health of the inmates.

S2M-300# Rosie Kane: Inhumanity at Dungavel—That the Parliament condemns the appalling practices of depriving children of food and fining parents at the Dungavel House immigration removal centre and considers that there should be a full public inquiry into the operation of Dungavel to assess its impact on the physical and mental health of the inmates. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Colin Fox*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mark Ballard*, Dennis Canavan*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Christine Grahame*, Margo MacDonald*, John Swinburne*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Shona Robison*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Chris Ballance*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-300# Inhumanity at Dungavel (lodged on 4 September 2003) Brian Adam*
